takes.take: Dunkin > Starbucks for iced coffee. Period. No debate.
The Green Line is the best line because it's above ground and you get to see the city.
Regina's Pizza in the North End is overrated. Santarpio's is where it's at.
Boston drivers are actually better than NYC drivers. We're aggressive with purpose.
The Red Sox are more important to Boston culture than the Patriots. Fight me.
Somerville has better restaurants than Cambridge. I said what I said.
MIT students are funnier than Harvard students. Harvard takes themselves too seriously.
The Boston accent is dying and that's honestly kind of sad.
New York bagels are better than Boston bagels. There, I said it.
The Pru > Hancock Tower. Better views, better vibe.
Trivia is more fun than karaoke. Karaoke is just drunk singing.
The MBTA is actually pretty good compared to most US cities. We just love to complain.
Faneuil Hall is for tourists. Locals know better.
Cold brew is just expensive iced coffee. Stop pretending it's fancy.
Boston winters build character. If you can't handle February, you can't handle Boston.
